questions.question: In your opinion why all the customer requirements associated with pressure sensor calibration lab could not be satisfied?

answers.b: Lack of undestanding of the requirements

questions.question: Is the dynamic simulation of the vacuum sensor setup matches with the fullest extent of customer requirements?
Which component of the vacuum calibration setup will consume maximum energy?
Which method will be useful for reducing the energy consumption of the pressure sensor calibration facility?

answers.a: By reducing the number of cycles of the experiments
answers.b: By maximising the number of sensors to be calibrated simultaneously
answers.c: By re-designning the entire calibration facility
